title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
In SilverStripe through 4.3.3, the previous fix for SS-2018-007 does not completely mitigate the risk of CSRF in GraphQL mutations,

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-12437
  • https://www.silverstripe.org/download/security-releases/cve-2019-12437
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fx37-56v6-85q6
items.title: [silverstripe/graphql] Silverstripe CSRF Protection Bypass via GraphQL

items.content_html:
In SilverStripe through 4.3.3, the previous fix for SS-2018-007 does not completely mitigate the risk of CSRF in GraphQL mutations,

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-12437

items.title: [silverstripe/graphql] Silverstripe CSRF Protection Bypass via GraphQL

items.content_html:
Dolibarr ERP/CRM before 10.0.3 allows SQL Injection.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19209
  • https://herolab.usd.de/security-advisories/usd-2019-0051/
  • https://www.dolibarr.org/forum/dolibarr-changelogs
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jh3j-xfv2-f9m9
items.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM SQLi

items.content_html:
Dolibarr ERP/CRM before 10.0.3 allows XSS because uploaded HTML documents are served as text/html despite being renamed to .noexe files.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19210
  • https://herolab.usd.de/security-advisories/usd-2019-0052/
  • https://www.dolibarr.org/forum/dolibarr-changelogs
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-87r3-4gc8-f897
items.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
Dolibarr ERP/CRM before 10.0.3 has an Insufficient Filtering issue that can lead to user/card.php XSS.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19211
  • https://herolab.usd.de/en/security-advisories/usd-2019-0053/
  • https://www.dolibarr.org/forum/dolibarr-changelogs
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gfhf-2xr5-2fvw
items.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A vulnerability was found in moodle 3.7 to 3.7.2 and before 3.7.3, where there is blind XSS reflected in some locations where user email is displayed.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-14881
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2019-14881
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=393584#p1586746
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/7455b741c954af3c3e7dfda2972edc1146ea1562
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9jf6-wq34-fg9w
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
Subrion CMS 4.2.1 has CSRF in panel/modules/plugins/. The attacker can remotely activate/deactivate the plugins.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7357
  • https://github.com/ngpentest007/CVE-2019-7357/blob/main/Subrion_4.2.1%20-%20CVE-2019-7357.pdf
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5mh2-82g9-72jv
items.title: [intelliants/subrion] Subrion CMS CSRF Vulnerability

items.content_html:
An XSS issue was identified on the Subrion CMS 4.2.1 /panel/configuration/general settings page. A remote attacker can inject arbitrary JavaScript code in the v[language_switch] parameter (within multipart/form-data), which is reflected back within a user's browser without proper output encoding.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-20389
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157699/Subrion-CMS-4.2.1-Cross-Site-Scripting.html
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xvgx-668j-f67p
items.title: [intelliants/subrion] Subrion CMS XSS

items.content_html:
A flaw was found in moodle versions 3.6 to 3.6.1, 3.5 to 3.5.3, 3.4 to 3.4.6, 3.1 to 3.1.15 and earlier unsupported versions. The /userpix/ page did not escape users' full names, which are included as text when hovering over profile images. Note this page is not linked to by default and its access is restricted.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-3810
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2019-3810
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=381230#p1536767
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-64372
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/162399/Moodle-3.6.1-Cross-Site-Scripting.html
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wm4w-8vc6-2j4h

items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A vulnerability was found in moodle before versions 3.6.3, 3.5.5, 3.4.8 and 3.1.17. Users with the "login as other users" capability (such as administrators/managers) can access other users' Dashboards, but the JavaScript those other users may have added to their Dashboard was not being escaped when being viewed by the user logging in on their behalf.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-3847
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2019-3847
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=384010#p1547742
  • http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/107489
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qrcj-6fjw-3h9h

items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A vulnerability was found in Moodle versions 3.7 before 3.7.3, 3.6 before 3.6.7, 3.5 before 3.5.9 and earlier. OAuth 2 providers who do not verify users' email address changes require additional verification during sign-up to reduce the risk of account compromise.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-14880
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2019-14880
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rv62-6f56-j83w
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Oauth 2 Insufficiently Protects Against Compromise

items.content_html:

items.content_html:
A CSRF vulnerability in Pagekit 1.0.17 allows an attacker to upload an arbitrary file by removing the CSRF token from a request.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19013
  • https://packetstormsecurity.com/files/155426/Pagekit-CMS-1.0.17-Cross-Site-Request-Forgery.html
  • https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/security-products/gemnasium-db/-/commit/fdf885ccf7c57c69f4d256bbb3ec76a927267a2b
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-692x-89xv-64jx
items.title: [pagekit/pagekit] Pagekit File Upload
